message.content:
cs.DM, cs.SI, cs.SY, cs.GT, cs.DS

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of target set selection in a graph with colored nodes, which falls under the category of discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The concept of influential networks and viral marketing also suggests a possible sub-category of social and information networks (cs.SI). The use of the linear threshold model and the study of local configurations indicate a possible sub-category of systems and control (cs.SY). The problem of finding the minimum number of initial colored nodes can also be seen as a graph theory problem, which suggests a possible sub-category of graph theory (cs.GT). Finally, the study of time complexity suggests a possible sub-category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
